question: [File: aptos-core/aptos-node/src/state_sync.rs] [State integrity] [Waypoint verification] Is the waypoint parameter cryptographically verified against the genesis or trusted checkpoint before use, or can a fake waypoint cause sync to wrong state? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-node/src/state_sync.rs] [State integrity] [Metadata persistence] Can PersistentMetadataStorage be corrupted if initialization fails partway through, leaving inconsistent on-disk state? (High)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-node/src/state_sync.rs] [State integrity] [ChunkExecutor state] Can the ChunkExecutor maintain inconsistent state if multiple components try to execute chunks concurrently? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-node/src/state_sync.rs] [State integrity] [Event subscription replay] Can event subscriptions receive duplicate or replayed events causing components to process the same reconfiguration multiple times? (High)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-node/src/state_sync.rs] [State integrity] [Storage service data] Can the storage service serve stale or incorrect data if it starts serving requests before fully syncing? (High)
